channel.title: Achievements and chapters not showing up.
channel.description: So, the game plays fine and all, but when I load chapters they look like this: [img]https://img651.imageshack.us/img651/3945/whatz.png[/img] They also do this on the maps themselves,I was just impatient. Also,when I do anything that would reward with an achievement, like burning the headcrab with a flare, it displays absolutely nothing and makes me mad I even tried to do it. Do I have to have some game, or is there an update I'm missing? :freeman: Gotta love custom smilies.:lambda:

item.title: Achievements and chapters not showing up.
item.dc:creator: Cpl.1nsane
item.description:
Looks like your Black Mesa folder is named incorrectly, It should be “BMS” so \Steam\steamapps\SourceMods\BMS

Read full topic
item.source: Achievements and chapters not showing up.

item.title: Achievements and chapters not showing up.
item.dc:creator: Shaddy
item.description:
So, the game plays fine and all, but when I load chapters they look like this:

They also do this on the maps themselves,I was just impatient.
Also,when I do anything that would reward with an achievement, like burning the headcrab with a flare, it displays absolutely nothing and makes me mad I even tried to do it. Do I have to have some game, or is there an update I’m missing?
:freeman: Gotta love custom smilies.:lambda:
